0:
--------------------
Text: Operation Romeo was a French World War II commando operation to disable German artillery atop the cliffs of Cap Nègre.
Triplets:<Operation Romeo
1:
--------------------
Text: Operation Romeo:  The operation happened the evening before Operation Dragoon, the main invasion of Southern France.
Triplets:<Operation Romeo
2:
--------------------
Text: Operation Romeo:  The force consisted of 800 French commandos of the "1er Commando Français de l'Afrique du Nord" (English:First French Commando of North Africa), commanded by Lieutenant Colonel Georges-Régis Bouvet.
Triplets:<Operation Romeo
